steps.name: Response time for Create user is less than 300ms
Status code Create Get user is 201
Content-Type for Create user is present
Response schema  for Create user is correct

name: Create user
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - http://localhost/users

raw 
  {
    "firstName": "Dream",
    "lastName": "Real",
    "email": "dream.real@gmail.com",
    "dateOfBirth": "2001-10-99",
    "emailVerified": true,
    "signUpDate": "2019-08-24",
    "status": "active",
    "level": "lord"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"firstName":"Dream","lastName":"Real","email":"dream.real@gmail.com","dateOfBirth":"2001-10-99","emailVerified":true,"signUpDate":"2019-08-24","status":"active","level":"lord","id":10}
